CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `trans_types` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment,
  `siteid` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `typename` varchar(64) collate ascii_bin NOT NULL,
  `url` varchar(128) collate ascii_bin default NULL,
  `price` decimal(8,2) NOT NULL,
  `earning` decimal(8,2) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY  (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `typename` (`typename`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM  DEFAULT CHARSET=ascii COLLATE=ascii_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=6 ;

INSERT INTO `trans_types` (`id`, `siteid`, `typename`, `url`, `price`, `earning`) VALUES
(1, 1, 'Type 1', 'http://chatwebmasters.com', 20.00, 25.00),
(2, 1, 'Type 2', 'http://chatwebmasters.com', 25.00, 35.00),
(3, 4, 'Type1(trial)', 'http://www.sexywivesfinder.com/cci.php?affid=__CAM__', 0.00, 0.00),
(4, 4, 'Type 2(bronze)', 'http://www.sexywivesfinder.com/cci.php?affid=__CAM__', 25.00, 35.00),
(5, 2, 'Per Pay Sale', 'http://www.hornymatches.com/dating/visit.php?campaign_id=__CAM__', 25.00, 35.00);
